verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H4905>Maschil.<s%> We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with our <S%H241>ears,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5608>told<s%> us, what <S%H6467>work<s%> thou <S%H6466>didst<s%> in their <S%H3117>days,<s%> in the <S%H3117>times<s%> of <S%H6924>old.<s%>

How <S%H859>thou<s%> didst drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> with thy <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5193>plantedst<s%> them; how thou didst <S%H7489>afflict<s%> the <S%H3816>people,<s%> and cast them <S%H7971>out.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they got <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H3423>possession<s%> by their own <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did their own <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> them: <S%H3588>but<s%> thy right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and thine <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and the <S%H216>light<s%> of thy <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thou hadst a <S%H7521>favor<s%> unto them.
Thou <S%H859><s%> art my <S%H4428>King,<s%> O <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H3444>deliverances<s%> for <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
Through thee will we push <S%H5055>down<s%> our <S%H6862>enemies:<s%> through thy <S%H8034>name<s%> will we tread them <S%H947>under<s%> that rise up <S%H6965>against<s%> us.
For <S%H3588><s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in my <S%H7198>bow,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall my <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> me.
But <S%H3588><s%> thou hast <S%H3467>saved<s%> us from our <S%H4480>enemies,<s%> <S%H6862><s%> and hast put them to <S%H954>shame<s%> that <S%H8130>hated<s%> us.
In <S%H430>God<s%> we <S%H1984>boast<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long, and <S%H3034>praise<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
But <S%H637><s%> thou hast cast <S%H2186>off,<s%> and put us to <S%H3637>shame;<s%> and goest not <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3808><s%> with our <S%H6635>armies.<s%>
Thou makest us to <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H6862>enemy:<s%> and they which <S%H8130>hate<s%> us <S%H8154>spoil<s%> for themselves.
Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> us like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> appointed for <S%H3978>meat;<s%> and hast <S%H2219>scattered<s%> us among the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>
Thou <S%H4376>sellest<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> for <S%H3808>naught,<s%> <S%H1952><s%> and dost <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7235>increase<s%> thy wealth by their <S%H4242>price.<s%>
Thou <S%H7760>makest<s%> us a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> a <S%H3933>scorn<s%> and a <S%H7047>derision<s%> to them that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> us.
Thou <S%H7760>makest<s%> us a <S%H4912>byword<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> a <S%H4493>shaking<s%> of the <S%H7218>head<s%> among the <S%H3816>people.<s%>
My <S%H3639>confusion<s%> is <S%H3605>continually<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me, and the <S%H1322>shame<s%> of my <S%H6440>face<s%> hath <S%H3680>covered<s%> me,
For the <S%H4480>voice<s%> <S%H6963><s%> of him that <S%H2778>reproacheth<s%> and <S%H1442>blasphemeth;<s%> by <S%H4480>reason<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%> and <S%H5358>avenger.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> is come <S%H935>upon<s%> us; yet have we <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> thee, <S%H3808>neither<s%> have we dealt <S%H8266>falsely<s%> in thy <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>
Our <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back,<s%> neither have our <S%H838>steps<s%> <S%H5186>declined<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thy <S%H734>way;<s%>
Though <S%H3588><s%> thou hast sore <S%H1794>broken<s%> us in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H5921><s%> us with the shadow of <S%H6757>death.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> we have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> or stretched <S%H6566>out<s%> our <S%H3709>hands<s%> to a <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H410>god;<s%>
Shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2713>search<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> out? <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H8587>secrets<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Yea, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> thy sake are we <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long; we are <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H2878>slaughter.<s%>
Awake, <S%H5782><s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H3462>sleepest<s%> thou, O <S%H136>Lord?<s%> <S%H6974>arise,<s%> <S%H2186>cast<s%> us <S%H408>not<s%> off <S%H5331>forever.<s%>
Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> <S%H5641>hidest<s%> thou thy <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H7911>forgettest<s%> our <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and our <S%H3906>oppression?<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is bowed <S%H7743>down<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust:<s%> our <S%H990>belly<s%> <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> unto the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Arise <S%H6965><s%> for our <S%H5833>help,<s%> and <S%H6299>redeem<s%> us for thy mercies' <S%H4616>sake.<s%> <S%H2617><s%>
